Plot: A witch tasks a childless baker and his wife with procuring magical items from classic fairy tales to reverse the curse put on their family tree.
Title: Into the Woods
Actors: Anna Kendrick, Daniel Huttlestone, James Corden, Emily Blunt
tomatoConsensus: On the whole, this Disney adaptation of the Sondheim classic sits comfortably at the corner of Hollywood and Broadway -- even if it darkens to its detriment in the final act.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 11 wins & 64 nominations.
